message.content:
cs.CL, cs.IR, cs.LG, cs.DL, cs.SI

This paper deals with measuring the novelty of scientific literature using text data and temporal embedding learning techniques. The paper focuses on analyzing the growth mechanisms of scientific knowledge, which is a common theme in the fields of computational linguistics (cs.CL), information retrieval (cs.IR), machine learning (cs.LG), deep learning (cs.DL), and social networks (cs.SI). Therefore, these five sub-categories are the most likely candidates for this paper.
